name: I Can't See You
description:
INCOMPLETE GAME

Playtime Length: Less than an hour

Story

Travel to a mysterious village where people get kidnapped all the time. Why are the people dissapearing? Why don't you play the game and find out?

"One of the best games I ever played" - IGN

Gameplay

Similar to Pokemon and the early Final Fantasy games without the battle mode. Talk the characters, play the puzzles and explore the world for the story to advance. Very similar to a visual novel.

GAME HAS TWO STORY BRANCHES AND NO ENDING AND NO SOUND
